Articles.Content:
Well, I guess I should formally say hello here.

I am a long time Orbiter player, I checked out KSP a while ago, but it was in quite early stages and I liked it not so much. Recently played the free demo again (was 0.20 I think) and bought it finally. Must say, I am very much enjoying this, despite of skepticism at first. Also the community seems quite nice. So hello, everyone!
Hello, and welcome. This does seem to be a friendly place. I'm sure if you need help, all you need do is ask.
